data.name: Fantasy Grounds - More Monsters (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This token pack contains 24 tokens. You can never have too many monsters. This set adds some new monsters to the mix.

This token pack includes:

  • Boggard Female
  • Boggard Male
  • Cyclops Female
  • Cyclops Male
  • Demon Tree Greater
  • Demon Tree Lesser
  • Demon Tree Roots
  • Derro Female
  • Derro Male
  • Eel, Giant
  • Elephant
  • Leech, Giant
  • Lizard
  • Mite
  • Nixie
  • Nymph
  • Panther
  • 2 Shadow Demons
  • Shark
  • Unicorn
  • 3 Vampire Bats

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on May 25, 2014. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.0.10 and higher.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license. This product should work with all rulesets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
